page.title: 15A PARISH COUNCILLOR
page.content: As East Meon is such a small village my roles as Councillor and School Governor are not very ardous.I am available for the villagers to come and put forward their grievances particularly where footpaths are concerned as this is my responsibility.Landowners seem to be keen to close footpath in order to protect their crops from being trampled on and neglecting and maintaining bridleways and stiles.As an extremely new member on the Board of School Governors I have attended three meetings.My role so far has been to support the Headmaster and listen to his recommendations and forward them where necessary to the Education Authorities through our Chairman.
